artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Folded black and white music sheet with the score on the recto and verso; from fashion periodical (P.15,503) that includes a folded hand-colored engraving of a man and a woman in fashionable period dress (P.15,501-P.15,502)
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Musical score ('Romance de Pauvre Jacques' by Jeanne-Renée de Bombelles) from Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Quatorzième Cahier, 5 Juillet 1790
